name: Backgammon Now
description:
Play on the go, on the bus or on the couch. Backgammon Now gives you a quick and awesome new way to play!

Backgammon Now gives you a great computer opponent to play against - and beat! Getting better? Track your game stats and see your performance improve!

With amazing features and super smooth gameplay, discover the fun and relaxed challenge of Backgammon!

• Awesome board theme's to choose from
• Choose your difficulty & improve your game!
• Touch-to-move or drag-to-move, you choose!
• Track your game stats & see your performance!
• Truly random physics based dice throwing!
• Get playing quick, with easy "How to Play"
• A super smooth, fun and relaxing game!
• Looks amazing, plays even better!

Backgammon Now (v1.01) a perfect entry into the world of Backgammon.

_______________________________________________

Backgammon Now Premium monthly subscription also available,

$1.49/£1.49/€1.49 monthly. New board themes, adds extended player stats (up to 14 days), adds custom dice, removes adverts from game and more.

Subscription payments will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Your subscription will automatically renew each month unless you cancel it 24-hours prior to the end of the current term. You can manage your subscription settings and turn off auto-renew at any time from your iTunes Account settings.
